title: What these workflows do?
text: Checks broken links inside repo. Example configuration main branch:
code: --- name: Checks üß©  on:   pull_request:     types:       - opened       - synchronize       - reopened       - ready_for_review     branches:       - main   push:     branches:       - main   workflow_dispatch:  jobs:   check-test:     name: Check üì¶     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/check.yml@main    lintr:     name: Lintr üîç     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/lintr.yml@main     with:       lintr-error-on-lint: true    gitleaks:     name: Gitleaks üåßÔ∏è     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/gitleaks.yml@main    roxygen:     name: Roxygen üìÑ     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/roxygen.yml@main    pkgdown:     name: Pkgdown üìñ     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/pkgdown.yml@main    links:     name: Check URLs üåê     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/links.yml@main
